alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Franklin and northeastern St. Lawrence Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Colton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Potsdam, Canton, Massena, Norfolk, Parishville, Colton, Norwood, Brasher Falls, Lawrenceville, Madrid, Dickinson, Pierrepont, Hopkinton, North Stockholm, Dickinson Center, West Parishville, West Stockholm, West Potsdam, Nicholville, and West Pierrepont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
